ingredients.content: 2 oz Gouda cheese, cut into pieces (approx. 1 ¼ in.)
4 - 5 oz canned sardines in oil, drained (approx. 2.8 oz direct weight)

preparations.content: Place cheese into mixing bowl and grate <b>10 sec/speed 8<b>.

Add sardines, butter, shallot, lemon juice, paprika, salt and pepper and mix <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and mix again <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>. Serve or refrigerate until needed.
